source: TEXT_FESEST2016_00326_EGGHUNTINGSTAFFA_000_000<tab>Good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day to you)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>, friend. Care to know more about this year's Hatching<var 1F /var>tide festivities? I never tire of enlightening the curious passerby.
target:
TEXT_FESEST2016_00326_EGGHUNTINGSTAFFA_000_000エグ、エグ、エグル、エッグルルルゥ～ッ♪
「エッグハント」のお祭りについて、
何か聞きたいことはありますか？

source: TEXT_FESEST2016_00326_Q1_000_000<tab>What would you like to know?
TEXT_FESEST2016_00326_A1_000_002<tab>Tell me about the egg hunt.
target: TEXT_FESEST2016_00326_A1_000_002<tab>「集めろ飾りタマゴ」について

source: TEXT_FESEST2016_00326_EGGHUNTINGSTAFFA_000_010<tab>Miss Jihli Aliapoh is the founder of our festival and the chosen herald of the Twelve Archons, legendary saviors from the time of the Sixth Umbral Calamity. She has great cause to believe that the Archons desire to walk amongst us once more, for they appeared to her in a grand vision a number of years ago.
target:
TEXT_FESEST2016_00326_EGGHUNTINGSTAFFA_000_010エッグハントとはそもそも、
グリダニアの少女「ジリ・アリアポー」が見た、
不思議な夢から始まったお祭りなんです。

source: TEXT_FESEST2016_00326_EGGHUNTINGSTAFFA_000_011<tab>She described the heroes of yore as triumphantly parting the clouds, riding atop beautifully decorated eggs and delivering a message: “Arise, young Dreamer, and make ready the vessels for our return!” In hearing their words, Miss Aliapoh has gathered others to her cause, known as the Dreamers, and together we aspire to bring about the Archons' divine descent, one decorated egg at a time.
target:
TEXT_FESEST2016_00326_EGGHUNTINGSTAFFA_000_011……話は、第七霊災の前に遡ります。
彼女の夢に現れた「卵に乗った賢者様」をお迎えするために、
飾りタマゴを探す「エッグハント」の催しが始まりました。

source: TEXT_FESEST2016_00326_EGGHUNTINGSTAFFA_000_012<tab>While our festivities have attracted townsfolk and adventurers alike, mostly for the famous egg hunts and prizes, we remind all that the reason we continue to live to this day is in part due to our twelve saviors' selfless actions during the Calamity. You could say Hatching<var 1F /var>tide is our way of paying respect to those heroes of ages past, and preparing for their return in the future.
target:
TEXT_FESEST2016_00326_EGGHUNTINGSTAFFA_000_012そして実際に、賢者様は霊災から人々をお救いになったのです。
そのことへの感謝の気持ちを忘れないために、
僕たちはエッグハントのお祭りを続けているのですよ。

source: TEXT_FESEST2016_00326_EGGHUNTINGSTAFFA_000_013<tab>Hear ye, hear all! The miracle of Hatching<var 1F /var>tide is upon us! Should you wish to join in the celebration, seek out the Dreamers at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre in Old Gridania.
target:
TEXT_FESEST2016_00326_EGGHUNTINGSTAFFA_000_013催しは「グリダニア」で行っておりますので、
ご参加いただけるようでしたら、ぜひいらしてくださいね！

source: TEXT_FESEST2016_00326_EGGHUNTINGSTAFFA_000_020<tab>Egg hunts are a tried and true Hatching<var 1F /var>tide tradition. Our founder has had multiple visions of adventurers bustling to find brilliant colored eggs. However, as is the case with dreams, no two hunts are quite alike.
target:
TEXT_FESEST2016_00326_EGGHUNTINGSTAFFA_000_020今回のエッグハントでは、グリダニアの都市内で、
「集めろ飾りタマゴ」という催しも開催しています。

source: TEXT_FESEST2016_00326_EGGHUNTINGSTAFFA_000_021<tab>Miss Aliapoh described the hunt in her most recent vision as “abrupt,” and sometimes “frantic,” ending no sooner than it appeared before blending into her next lucid vision. To recreate that feeling, our founder has hidden white Archon eggs amongst the vibrantly colored decorations you see around Old Gridania, and employed her most fidgety spriggan to oversee the frivolities for as long as it can stand still. Should you spot this spriggan sauntering about, follow him, and the hunt will soon begin.
target:
TEXT_FESEST2016_00326_EGGHUNTINGSTAFFA_000_021制限時間内に、街中に隠された「飾りタマゴ」を、
ひとつでも多く探し当てる……という内容の催しです。
開催しているところに出会ったら、ぜひ参加してくださいね。

source: TEXT_FESEST2016_00326_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>During this event, the FATE “Eggstract and Eggspedite” will appear throughout Old Gridania. The fortune eggs received as rewards for participating in these FATEs can be exchanged for seasonal goods.
target:
TEXT_FESEST2016_00326_SYSTEM_000_022期間中、「グリダニア：旧市街」では、
F.A.T.E.『エッグハント「集めろ飾りタマゴ」』が発生します。
参加して、報酬の「」を手に入れましょう。

source: TEXT_FESEST2016_00326_EGGHUNTINGSTAFFA_000_030<tab>Every year, we Dreamers prepare a multitude of prizes for all who join in the celebration of Hatching<var 1F /var>tide. How do you obtain these prizes, you ask? Why, gathering fortune eggs, of course! This year, we have an array of games for you to play and upon completion, each which will reward you with an egg.
target:
TEXT_FESEST2016_00326_EGGHUNTINGSTAFFA_000_030開催されている様々な催しに参加すると、
報酬として「」がもらえます！

source: TEXT_FESEST2016_00326_EGGHUNTINGSTAFFA_000_032<tab>After you have gathered a basketful, you can exchange them with the lass standing here next to me for a variety of decorations to spread the spirit of the season.
target:
TEXT_FESEST2016_00326_EGGHUNTINGSTAFFA_000_032「」をたくさん集めて、
「エッグドリーマー」に持って行けば、
素敵な景品と交換できますよ！

source: TEXT_FESEST2016_00326_SYSTEM_000_034<tab>Alternatively, you can exchange fortune eggs for exclusive seasonal goods by speaking with the Hatching<var 1F /var>tide Dreamers. They can be found in each of the three city<var 1F /var>states.
target:
TEXT_FESEST2016_00326_SYSTEM_000_034「」を
三都市の「エッグドリーマー」に持ち込むと、
様々なアイテムと交換してもらうことができます。
